episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: We’re back with a regular episode this week! Loads of exciting exclusives, including an absolutely huge Nicolas Haelg remix of ‘Make It Happen’. An episode not to miss!!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 089

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: We have something very cool this week, an entire episode hosted by the one and only Ben Gold! New tracks from Gareth Emery, Ashley Wallbridge, John O’Callaghan and more.
episodes.title: Electric For Life 088 (Ben Gold Takeover)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Today’s episode is all about uplifting trance and nothing else! Featuring the new remixes of ‘We Were Young’ and ‘Make It Happen’. Definitely one of our best shows this year. Make sure to give it a listen and you wont be disappointed!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 087 (Uplifting Trance Special)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Huge new episode featuring the worldwide debut of John O’Callaghan’s remix of ‘Save Me’, plus music from Cosmic Gate, Luke Bond and more!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 086

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: #EFL085! This week we got an exciting new remix of ‘Hands’, plus music from Lane 8, Nora En Pure, Tritonal and more! Make sure to also check out this week’s #ElectricWarmup from Maxim Klein!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 085

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Might as well be our biggest episode this summer! An amazing hour of music today, featuring two Gareth Emery exclusives. Make sure to check out Electric Warm Up, the new series of mixes you can listen to at our soundcloud.
episodes.title: Electric For Life 084

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Two weeks ago we said a proper goodbye to one of the best club nights in the world. Thank you Godskitchen for so many happy memories since I first went in 2000 and love the fact you didn't sadly fade away but went out with a bang! This set is nothing but trance classics. Hope you like it and see you soon! Gaz x
episodes.title: Electric For Life 083 (Classics set from Godskitchen, The Last Dance)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Live From EDC Las Vegas 2016
episodes.title: Live From EDC Las Vegas 2016

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Not one, not two, but three huge artists are taking control of this week's episode! Featuring worldwide debuts of the previously unheard remixes from Matt Fax and Gai Barone.
episodes.title: Electric For Life 082 (Extended special with Standerwick and Matt Fax)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Gareth Emery's UK tour is now over..and safe to say it was the most exciting tour this year so far!! To share the incredible experience with fans all over the world, Gareth has recorded his set from the legendary Sankeys nightclub in Manchester. Enjoy!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 081 (Live From Sankeys, Manchester, 6-3-2016)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: A very special episode with two Garuda exclusives! Watch out for Gareth Emery's new 'Electric For Life Ibiza' compilation this Friday and make sure to see us at Amnesia Ibiza on June 16th!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 080 (Ibiza Special)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Summer is here! Get in the mood for sunny weather with some good music by your side, including hot new tunes from Martin Garrix, Mark Knight, Tritonal and more!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 079

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: We have a HUGE exclusive this week, the Ferry Corsten remix for Gareth Emery's new single 'Lost'! An episode you don't want to miss!! Follow Electric For Life on twitter: @electricforlife
episodes.title: Electric For Life 078

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: An exciting hour of new music featuring tracks from Tiesto, Dimitri Vangelis & Wyman, Joris Voorn and an amazing Adam Ellis remix of 'Lost'! Make sure to follow Electric For Life on twitter: https://twitter.com/electricforlife
episodes.title: Electric For Life 077

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Get ready for some exciting premieres, including the new solo single from Christina Novelli 'Where We Began'! Let us know what you think about the show on twitter using #EFL076 and make sure to vote for your favourite track at http://electricfor.life.
episodes.title: Electric For Life 076

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Kicking of May 2016 with a very special episode hosted by Craig Connelly! Check out #EFL075 to hear 'Far From Home' remixer's current favourites, taken from various genres of electronic music.
episodes.title: Electric For Life 075 (Craig Connelly Takeover)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: The wait is over! #EFL074 features a radio premiere of the highly anticipated Craig Connelly remix of "Far From Home". Released this Friday! Don't forget to subscribe to the Electric For Life playlist on Spotify: SPTFY.COM/EFL
episodes.title: Electric For Life 074

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Are you ready for a whole new selection of the finest music around? This week's episodes features tracks from Gareth Emery, Tritonal, Ben Gold and many more! Make sure to vote for your favourite tune at http://electricfor.life
episodes.title: Electric For Life 073

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: If you are looking for a one hour of the best music around, look no further! After a very special '100 Reasons To Live' episode last week, we are back with a huge selection of music from Gareth Emery, The Chainsmokers, W&W, Arty and more.
episodes.title: Electric For Life 072

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Gareth Emery speaks candidly about his new album 100 Reasons To Live, answering fan questions and giving an insight into what it takes to put together an artist album. Beers and pizza were consumed – expect VERY explicit language.
episodes.title: Gareth Emery talks 100 Reasons To Live with co-host Roxanne Emery

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: This week's Electric For Life features the worldwide debut of Gareth's new track 'Sansa'. 100 Reasons To Live, the new album from Gareth Emery comes out this Friday!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 070

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: After a fantastic week in Miami we're back with a selection of amazing new records from Gareth Emery, Rodg, Lane 8 and more. Make sure to visit electricfor.life where you can download all of our episodes and leave a vote for your favourite track this week!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 069

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Miami Music Week 2016 is here! To celebrate, Gareth Emery has put together an #EFLMIAMI special with guest mixes from Cash Cash, Michael Woods, Ben Nicky, Carl Nunes, Louis Vivet and Lanos. A perfect episode to get ready for the Electric For Life pool party on March 19th!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 068 (Miami 2016 Special)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: EFL067: MIAMI POOLSIDE EDITION! Miami Music Week is nearly upon us, so what better time to drop a podcast full of delicious poolside tracks?
episodes.title: Electric For Life 067 (Miami Poolside Edition)

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: First spring episode brings a selection of amazing tunes from Ferry Corsten, Jerome Isma-Ae, Betsie Larking and more!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 066

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Big episode this week, including the debut single from Gareth Emery's new album 100 REASONS TO LIVE
episodes.title: Electric For Life 065

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Make sure not to miss this week's episode! New music from Eric Prydz, Rudimental, Markus Schulz and more.
episodes.title: Electric For Life 064

episodes.author: Gareth Emery
episodes.summary: Huge new episode with music from Eric Prydz, Markus Schulz and an amazing Dan Stone remix of Once More!
episodes.title: Electric For Life 063

summary: Join Don Diablo and his little electronic buddy Hex for a weekly journey in to the unknown.. Playing an eclectic selection of music from the best new house to the whole spectrum of electronica, Hexagon Radio is a 60min sonic adventure full of exclusive ReHex tracks, Flashback classics and a showcase for new talent in #DemoDay.
title: Don Diablo Presents Hexagon Radio
